trainServices.cancelReason: This train has been cancelled because of trespassers on the railway earlier today
trainServices.delayReason: This train has been delayed by trespassers on the railway earlier today

nrccMessages.value: No Southern or Gatwick Express services to / from London Victoria. More details can be found in Latest Travel News

Lines have now reopened following a trespass incident at Shoreham-by-Sea. However, whilst service recovers, trains running through the station may be delayed by up to 10 minutes or revised. More details can be found in Latest Travel News.
